text: American singer and songwriter Donna De Lory has released ten studio albums (including one with other artists), four extended plays (EPs), two live albums, three remix albums, 17 singles (including one as a featured artist), three promotional singles, and 7 music videos. == Studio albums == {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- !
